main event: A brilliant object with flames and jet-like trail was sighted over Kansas City on September 8, 1962.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for approximately 1 hour., The object showed a bright light display that resembled an afterburner., Witnesses reported seeing two separate objects; the first was visible for 3-4 minutes and the second for 5-7 minutes., The observer, a calm housewife and part-time federal employee, detailed the sighting rationally., The weather during the sighting was upper 50's and initially cloudy before clearing to the northwest.
sighted object: one brilliant object with flames and jet-like trail
witness description: female housewife, part-time federal employee, calm and rational during observation
